isis.stitle: Electrical System Troubleshooting Guide - BE 200, CE 200, CE 300 Model - FANS AND ENGINE ACCESSORIES - FAN WIRING - INTERNATIONAL ENGINES - EXTENDED DESCRIPTION

svcproc.title: EXTENDED DESCRIPTION
svcproc.para: When the key is on, voltage is supplied to the fan air solenoid (6407) or the shutter solenoid (8450) on pin A from the 10 amp fuse F15.
The engine controller will supply a ground to energize the fan air solenoid (6407) on pin B from engine controller connector (6021) pin 14.
The engine controller will supply a ground to energize the shutter solenoid (8450) on pin B from engine controller connector (6020) pin 22.
